metadata.title: CVE-2024-32493 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Znuny LTS 6.5.1 through 6.5.7 and Znuny 7.0.1through 7.0.16 where a logged-in agent is able to inject SQL in the draftform ID parameter of an AJAX request.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-32493` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs2 - 6.5.8-1
znuny - 6.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: znuny package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.8-1').
